title: Cloud Object Storage
description: Information for Cloud Object Storage Integration.

cos-bucket-name.description: A bucket name in your Cloud Object Storage instance. This will be used as a locker to store the artifacts and evidences generated by the   Pipelines.

cos-api-key.description: The Service API Key used by the pipeline to write to COS Bucket.
cos-api-key.title: Service ID API Key

form.title: Cloud Object Storage is used to store the artifacts generated by the Pipeline. Users are required to have a Cloud Object Storage instance and a Bucket. Please provide the Bucket name and service API-Key. For help, please visits the [Cloud Object Storage documentation](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/cloud-object-storage?topic=cloud-object-storage-getting-started-cloud-object-storage).
